answer:
Hepatitis A or B and tetanus vaccine can be given at the same time. They should however, be given in separate needles. If you have other questions, please contact your immunization provider.
Immunization Nurse
question: Hi. Can hepatitis vaccine (a or b) and tetanus vaccine be given together?
question_variation_0: can you give hepatitis and tetanus vaccination one shot
question_variation_1: can hepatitis vaccine and tetanus vaccine be given together?
question_variation_2: can hepatitis c and tetanus be given together in same day?
